attributes.action: The BBC should no longer be state funded and we should scrap the licence fee
attributes.background: The BBC continues to be state funded, whilst most other media outlets are not. Despite being state funded, the BBC has and continues to become more and more political in its reporting, and is no longer an independent broadcaster in my view. It fails on all accounts to be impartial and has an agenda

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/179823
